title: DEVOPS ENGINEER
body:
Tasks:

  • Development and maintenance of solutions helping development teams to deliver

high-quality results faster;

  • Configure R&D tools and Agile tools for teams and projects and provide

support for the internal customers;

  • Maintaining and monitoring of our internal seamless toolchain;
  • Supporting and maintaining dedicated method, tools and scripts ;
  • Staying up to date with system information, changes and updates;
  • Maintaining a Knowledge Database;
  • Preparing trainings, documents and statistics;
  • Maintain and improve the integration between the tools;
  • Troubleshooting, reporting and escalating Issues.

Requirements:

  • Bachelorâ€™s degree (or compareable experience) in Computer Science, Computer

Engineering, Electrical Engineering, or related field.

  • Minimum of 2 (preferred 5+) years of relevant experience in the related technical

field as a DevOps engineer.- System administration knowledge: Windows OS, Linux, batch scripts, commands, file system;

  • Knowledge of Continuous Integration / Continuous delivery practices;
  • Git, GitHub, Gerrit, Jenkins, Artifactory, Linux, Docker, Cloud solutions;
  • Atlassian Jira, Confluence, Perforce;
  • Programming knowledge: Shell/Batch Scripting, Python, Perl, Java/Groovy, JavaScript;
  • Attention to detail and accuracy and Strong analytical skills;
  • Good communication and team skills;
  • Presentation skills are appreciated;
  • Good writing, reading and speaking English skills; Knowledge of Agile Software

Development process and methods;

  • Eager to learn new things and to investigate for solutions;

Nice to Have:

  • Previous experience with Jenkins and Git in a SW development environment.
  • Experience setting up and operating AWS platform services, AWS security, AWS IoT

Services
